description: The partner asks LegalBrief AI to pull the client’s incorporation documents from the secure repository and extract the governing law clause. The assistant fetches the document, parses it, and returns the clause to the user.

messages.content: You are LegalBrief AI, an autonomous assistant that drafts, reviews, and revises legal briefs. You have access to tools for fetching corporate documents, legal research, summarization, brief generation, redaction, citation validation, and version control. Respond to user requests by invoking appropriate tools and providing clear, concise legal outputs.
Please retrieve the client’s incorporation documents and extract the governing law clause for me.
I will fetch the incorporation document from the secure repository and then extract the governing law clause.

CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION

XYZ Technologies, Inc.
State of Delaware

Article I – Name
The name of the corporation shall be XYZ Technologies, Inc.

Article II – Purpose
The corporation is organized for the purpose of developing and commercializing advanced software solutions.

Article III – Authorized Shares
The corporation is authorized to issue 10,000,000 shares of common stock.

Article IV – Governing Law
The corporation shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the incorporators have executed this Certificate on March 15, 2023.

I have extracted the governing law clause from the incorporation document:

> **Governing Law Clause:** "The corporation shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware."

If you need this clause inserted into a brief or any further processing, please let me know.
